alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cuyahoga and northern Lorain Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wakeman to North Ridgeville. Movement was east at 10 mph. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to flooding. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Lorain, Elyria, Vermilion, Parma, Lakewood, Strongsville, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Avon Lake, Amherst, North Olmsted, Avon, Parma Heights, Rocky River, Brook Park, Berea, Fairview Park and Middleburg Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
